description: Creates a resource control policy for a given resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource for which the policy is being created.

parameters.name: ResourcePolicy
parameters.description: The JSON-formatted resource policy to create.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request. If you do not set the client request token, Amazon Lookout for Equipment generates one. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource for which the policy was created.

nested_items.name: PolicyRevisionId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for a revision of the resource policy.
